entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:15 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:15 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:15 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 11. Forecast issued 11:15 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
